body: Cheney, I don't have a hard time getting ASE1000lx,250h below 10% of the floor area and I get pretty expected results for a North-Facing room: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Yh-B8VrdxHjT*XA4kmez9rj3X5STjpBvwz3jB8a3Ry6zXwZfE5lJ0mnpiz4KJTJuGsJ7oh9ZZSBTxvofsXV4w9H2KnYwZDKD/OrientModel2North.JPG) I attached the file with a North facgin room so that you can see how it works. -Chris
